However, people who carry one altered copy of the PGAM2 gene may have some features of phosphoglycerate mutase deficiency, including episodes of exercise-induced muscle cramping and myoglobinuria.",GHR,phosphoglycerate mutase deficiency
What are the treatments for phosphoglycerate mutase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of phosphoglycerate mutase deficiency:  -
